description.en: A villa might have elaborate pools, gardens, farmlands, and other buildings surrounding the villa

A chalet is a type of house or cottage made of wood with a heavy, gentle sloping roof and wide edges set at right angles in the front. Also called as Swiss chalet, such homes are very common in Europeâ€™s Alpine region. The term is used to refer to the hut of a herder. These days, chalets have emerged as holiday homes for ski and hiking enthusiasts, who prefer to stay on mountain tops during their vacations
A cabin is any mountain or vacation home in the Smoky Mountains
These are the standard operations that provide a place to stay and varying amenities and services
